### Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the assembling machine
- Ensure the first argument in the `insert_item` function is a valid Prototype. Check that the ingredient name corresponds to a valid item in the game.
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the assembling machine.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
